full_summary:
### Analysis of Mining Supply and Service Firms Operating in Canada

#### Solicitation Information
_____________________

* Solicitation Number: NRCan 5000077241
* Publication Date: November 1, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: December 28, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Date: December 28, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 8, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025

#### Contracting Entity
_____________________

* Contracting Entity: Natural Resources Canada

#### Procurement
_____________________

* Procurement Category: Service (SRV)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

#### Tender Description
_____________________

Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is soliciting proposals from qualified bidders to create a comprehensive and reliable methodology to:
a. Provide the most accurate count of the number of mining supply and service (MSS) firms operating in Canada; and
b. That can be replicated and internalized by the Crown for future annual tracking and reporting.

The methodology developed under this contract is expected to inform efforts to develop messaging and branding materials to promote Canada's mining sector.

#### Tender Requirements
_____________________

* Proposals must be submitted electronically through the Canadabuys website by the specified deadline;
* Respondents must demonstrate their ability to meet the requirements outlined in the tender;
* The successful bidder will be awarded a contract in accordance with the Government of Canada's contracting and procurement policies and procedures.
